title: Zeta_Angel
description: Zeta_Angel (2024) is an interactive game environment that questions how we perceive and interact with objects in real spaces against virtual ones. Built from found digital objects and ripped game assets, the virtual environment is a composite of discarded digital artefacts, exploring the differences between human and virtual language frameworks. Made in Unity and Blender using kit-bashing techniques, the process aims to challenge and reimagine current digital creation to be more open and accessible. This project was also recently adapted into UEFN for more platform compatibility. Exhibited At Hypha Studios 'HARD WIRED' Show 2024
